meanings.sent1: She saved up all her chings to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent2: He worked hard to earn more chings for his family.
meanings.sent3: Finding unexpected chings in her pocket made her day.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, chings can be the key to success.
meanings.sent5: The shiny chings in the piggy bank tempted him to spend them.

meanings.definition: A sound made by metal objects hitting each other.
meanings.sent1: The loud chings of the hammer on the anvil echoed in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: The chings of the wind chimes soothed her as she relaxed in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected chings in the dark alley startled the cat.
meanings.sent4: The chings of the coins falling into the jar sounded like music to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic chings of the blacksmith's tools created a symphony of work.

meanings.definition: A slang term for luck or good fortune.
meanings.sent1: She believed her lucky charm brought her good chings in life.
meanings.sent2: He felt a wave of chings when he found a four-leaf clover.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected chings of winning the lottery left him speechless.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chance, chings can turn the tables in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The chings of good fortune followed her wherever she went.
